name: Earth Defenders (itch)
description:
Create Game-Jam project. A co-op game where the two players cooperated to defend the earth from objects from space. One player controls the missile-launcher and is supposed to damage the enemies. The other player controls the hook-launcher and is supposed to collect the minerals that gives points.

The game is set up to use 2 xbox-controllers...

The controls are the same for the two players, the left-joystick is used to rotate around the earth and the "A" button is used to shoot.
